**Welcome to [Turbo] - Classic Mafia I**
Hosted by @KyoDaz
This setup follows simple forum rules. The setup will start once 7 players have signed up. The setup will start on Day 1. There is no Day 1 lynch.
**Gameplay**
Days will be 10 minutes long. Nights will be 5 minutes long. All actions must be done in your rolecard. The town alignment is the [color=#FFD505]Yellow Poppy[/color]. The mafia alignment is the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color]. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] automatically win once majority is reached. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] can only communicate during the night. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] have a faction kill. The [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color] may choose who carries out the kill each night. The only role that will receive ability feedback is the [color=#FFD505]Constable[/color].
**Executions**
To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions will be plurality. Players are not lynched until the end of the day unless all votes are received. Any ties in votes will be determined a no-lynch. Please ask if you are unsure of any lynch scenarios.
**To Join**
To join, please '**/in**'
**Rolelist**

># [color=#FFD505]Druid[/color] > If you are attacked during the night you will die alongside your attacker. > Defeat all members of the [color=#FFF1E6]White Primrose[/color].
[/details]
